name: Incremental Casino
description:
Made for GMTK Game Jam 2022.

Roll your way into financial success in a chance-based incremental game.

*Known Bugs*

The menu buttons (including pressing M in achievements section) are sometimes unresponsive and you have to spam click them. This bug is impossible to fix and I would highly recommend that this bug shouldn't affect your rating.

DM Me Your Review or Comment on this page.
